site_name: South Grounds, Royal Hospital, Royal Hospital Road, LONDON, SW3 4SR
description: Variation of conditions 1 (Limited period), 2 (Compliance with approved drawings), 6 (Event traffic management plan, Event Travel Plan and Event Management Plan) and 8 (Protection of trees) of planning permission reference PP/22/06578 (Temporary use of South Grounds for the Salon Privâ€š London automotive event for three days in April each year, including erection of temporary marquees from six days prior and three days after the event inclusive; temporary plant, temporary disabled parking, cycle parking and other temporary works ancillary to use (Major Application)) to facilitate changes to approved site layout plan and associated floorplans and elevations of the event.
